content.description: This is a superb big roof crack, with wide hand jamming at the crux, a great climb.  Start up a less than vertical crack and climb up to the roof.  You can use the wall for a while as you climb under the roof, but then you need to cut loose and do some upside down jamming until the angle eases to vertical.  It's difficult to let go and place protection on the crux, but there is nothing but air to hit if you fall.  This climb gets morning sun.
content.protection: standard rack, with doubles in the hand to fist sizes

climbs.name: Morongo Child
climbs.fa: Allen Sanderson and Kent Raygor, November 1988

content.description: Start up Morongo Man, but instead of committing to the roof crack where it splits away from the wall, do a hand and fist jam traverse left along the wall and escape onto the face above.  This is an exciting climb with some loose rock.
content.protection: doubles in the hand to fist size

climbs.name: Crimpergirl
climbs.fa: FA  Todd Gordon, Jake Adams, T. Tech, Blitzo, Crystal Henderson, Will

content.description: About 100 ft left of "Morongo Man", Climb a short crack with a bush at the base. At the first bolt , traverse right passing another bolt to a crack. Climb this crack to 5.8 face with another bolt. Two bolt anchor.
content.protection: 2.5"-3" for inital crack. small to 1.5" for crack, 3 bolts.

content.description: Cool climb on arete. South facing on large boulder between Beluga Boulders and Morongo Man.. Can be seen from Split Rocks Parking Lot. 4 bolts to 2 bolt anchor.
content.location: On the hillside between the Beluga Boulders, and Morongo Man.  You can see this boulder from the Split Rocks Parking lot.

content.description: This is a cool crack climb about 100 yards left of Morongo Man.  It is the last crack on the hillside before you get to the top of the hills idea.  Start in a left crack...switch over to the right crack.  Bolted anchor on top.
content.protection: Top rope. Bolted anchor on top..could be a lead with one or two bolts where the crack gets too thin...
content.location: From split rocks parking..hike on the loop trail north east...after about 10 minutes hiking, branch off right towards Morongo Man cliff located on far left side of cliff band, just before the cool or notch.
